meanings.sent1: The bread was leavened and had a fluffy texture.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the leavened cake at the party.
meanings.sent3: The leavened dough bubbled happily in the oven.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter leavened the somber atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The leavened loaf smelled heavenly as it baked.

meanings.sent1: The baker used leavened flour for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: They savored the taste of the leavened pancakes.
meanings.sent3: The leavened cookies danced in the jar.
meanings.sent4: His leavened words lifted her spirits.
meanings.sent5: The leavened pastry melted in her mouth.

meanings.definition: To cause to rise by fermentation
meanings.sent1: She leavened the dough by adding yeast.
meanings.sent2: The warm temperature helped the bread leaven.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a vacation leavened his mood.
meanings.sent4: His kindness leavened the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The music leavened the atmosphere of the party.
